description: Returns information about the current blue/green deployment happening on a domain, including a change ID, status, and progress stages.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain you want to get the progress information about.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressStatus
nested_items.description: Progress information for the configuration change that is requested in the DescribeDomainChangeProgress request.

nested_items.name: ChangeId
nested_items.description: The unique change identifier associated with a specific domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the configuration change is made on the domain.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The overall status of the domain configuration change. This field can take the following values: PENDING, PROCESSING, COMPLETED and FAILED.

nested_items.name: PendingProperties
nested_items.description: The list of properties involved in the domain configuration change that are still in pending.

nested_items.name: CompletedProperties
nested_items.description: The list of properties involved in the domain configuration change that are completed.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfStages
nested_items.description: The total number of stages required for the configuration change.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressStages
nested_items.description: The specific stages that the domain is going through to perform the configuration change.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the specific progress stage.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The overall status of a specific progress stage.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the progress stage.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The last updated timestamp of the progress stage.

nested_items.name: ConfigChangeStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the configuration change.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the status of the configuration change was updated.

nested_items.name: InitiatedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM principal who initiated the configuration change.
